service.get:
select * from CRAWLER_INFO where order_id = #{order_id}
and order_malltype = #{order_malltype}
service.query:
select ci_uuid,order_id,order_sourceinfo,order_info,order_malltype,order_createtime,order_status,crawmu_uuid,jsessionid,sale_order_no,serv_order_no_list,cbssnum,usim from CRAWLER_INFO where 1=1
and sale_order_no = '${filter.sale_order_no}'
and serv_order_no_list = '${filter.serv_order_no_list}'
select 'S'||order_status as order_id,count(0) as order_info from crawler_info where order_status in (0,430,530) and crawmu_uuid = '${filter.crawmu_uuid}' group by order_status order by order_id
select * from code_region cr start with cr.region_code in (select c.region_code from code_region c where region_name=#{filter.region_name}) connect by prior cr.region_code = cr.upper_region_id;

select cra_sku_uuid,CRA_SKU_NAME,SKU_ID,cra_sku_stats,oper_code from CRAWLER_SKU_DEFINE where 1=1
and cra_sku_uuid = '${filter.cra_sku_uuid}'
and cra_sku_name = '${filter.cra_sku_name}'
and sku_id = '${filter.sku_id}'
and cra_sku_stats = '${filter.cra_sku_stats}'
and oper_code = '${filter.oper_code}'
order by cra_sku_uuid desc

service.get: select t.*,t.rowid from crawler_infocallback t where ci_uuid = #{ci_uuid} and tache_code = #{tache_code}
service.query:
select CICB_UUID,CI_UUID,CICB_CALLBACKINFO,MODI_TIME,TACHE_CODE,CBSSNUM,USIM,LOGISTICS_NO from CRAWLER_INFOCALLBACK where 1=1
and ci_uuid = '${filter.ci_uuid}'
and tache_code = '${filter.tache_code}'

service.update: update CRAWLER_MALL_USER set crawmu_name =#{crawmu_name}, crawmu_pwd=#{crawmu_pwd}, crawmu_basereqcookie=#{crawmu_basereqcookie}, crawmu_rescookie=#{crawmu_rescookie}, crawmu_sessioncookie=#{crawmu_sessioncookie}, crawmu_uacname=#{crawmu_uacname}, crawmu_type=#{crawmu_type} where crawmu_uuid =#{crawmu_uuid}
